title: Is 'progressivism' a political philosophy or just a life philosophy? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Is "progressivism" a political philosophy or just a life philosophy? Progressivism is neither a political philosophy or a life philosophy but more of an attitude which is the opposite of conservativism. Progressivism is a proto-philosophy because there is no system of believes. The two form a dichotomy of attitudes or a duality of opposite principles. Progressives are anti-conservatives. Conservatives are anti-progressives. Good luck America.
